name: Dice Knight MAGD Expo Demo
description:
Dice Knight is a top down RPG that takes heavy influence from table top role playing games and turns it into a fast paced shooter adventure game.

This is the MAGD Expo 2020 Demo build of the game. It is still a work in progress.

After playing, if you have the time, I would greatly appreciate feed back. Here is a link to a survey about your experience with Dice Knight: https://s.surveyplanet.com/bz0dIFh6p. Thank you.
